Text: Re Conference CallIt looks like Gaylen is going to take vacation on Friday Jan Would it be possible to move our conference call to Thursday Jan at am your time If you have a conflict let me know Im sure we could call Gaylen on his cell phone on Friday Thanks Kim

Blanco Site Visit August Cc In order to accommodate different travel schedules and to have an opportunity to visit with each company separately and then together we have developed the following schedule for meetings am Meeting with Questar and TransColorado am Meeting with Questar and Williams pm Group Lunch pm TransWestern arrivesSite visit with entire group pm Meeting with Questar and TransWestern Dress will be casual Questar will provide morning refreshments and lunch at the Williams meeting place We wish to thank the Williams people for allowing us to use the facility We hope this schedule will work for all parties If you have any questions or concerns please call either Jodi Starley at or Gaylen Haag at Also attached is a map with directions to the Blanco site for those out of town visitors who may need it Thanks again for your cooperation and we look forward to our visit
Re Interconnect AgreementI just received the fax from Craig Buehler Thank you so much Well be in touch Hope you have a nice weekend

Re Agreement Cc Just wanted you both to know that we received the original contract in the mail today Now I have the faxed copy and the original Sorry to have been such a pest thanks again for all your help ps well get going on the amendment and well be in touch

Data Room Information Cc Hello Kim I have attached the index listing all documents that are available in the Data Room The only specific items that we would prefer not to copy are the drawings however we do have some maps available for you to take I spoke to Ned about the dates you had mentioned and unfortunately next week several key people will be out of town At this time November is available but I need to make sure that our engineers and legal counsel will also be available I will let you know as soon as possible Please call if you have any further questions Thanks
Data Room InfoI have attached the list in Word format Ill call you later this afternoon as soon as I talk to Ned Thanks

Re Data RoomI have reviewed the list you sent me regarding items you would like to see in the Data Room I spoke to Ned Greenwood and Jerry Mouser the project coordinators about this list We do have several of the items you listed however rather than having every document available we have our Engineers Legal Counsel and Financial Advisor available and ready to meet with you oneonone If you would like to fax a list of specific questions you may have please do so I would also like to ask that you please send me a list of the people who will be coming with you and their titles or job responsibilities We look forward to meeting with you here on Monday and well do our best to make your time worthwhile Thank you

Confidentiality Agreement PLEASE OPEN ASAPKim as per Gaylens phone message I have attached the Confidentiality Agreement for the third partys signature Please have them sign if youre planning to bring them to the Data Room or if you plan on divulging confidential information to them Thank you for your help in this matter Please call Gaylen or myself if you have any questions
Re Request for Transportation Cc FYI Please see the attached letter This was faxed to Craig Buehler on Thanks

Tax ID Dunns Cc Here are the numbers you requested Southern Trails Federal Tax ID Dunns Please note this number is for all of Questar Pipeline Company Southern Trails does not have their own Dunns We appreciate all your help in this matter Please call if you have any questions or need any further information Thank you Jodi Starley

Re Attachment A Payment ScheduleI have attached the payment schedule for the Interconnect Operating Agreement We thought you should have an electronic copy as well We look forward to talking with you on Friday Thanks

RE Request for Transportation WithdrawalGood Morning and welcome back I hope you had a great vacation Youll have to tell me about it I converted the attached letter in Word sorry about that and Craig took care of me Ill talk to you soon Thanks
